Achilles Heel Guard.NAME: Achilles Heel Guard
Achilles Heel Guard.FLAVOR: It's fragile, don't let it crack.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you haven't taken damage this combat, gain [E] at the start of your turn.

Blighted Snail.NAME: Blighted Snail
Blighted Snail.FLAVOR: You get lost in those smooth curves.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each turn deal damage that increases each turn by the Fibonacci sequence (0,1,1,2,3,5,8,...).

Business Contract.NAME: Business Contract
DESCRIPTIONS: The Merchant's removal service can be used any number of times.

Comic Book.NAME: Comic Book
DESCRIPTIONS: The first colorless card you play each combat is played twice.

Circular Logic Widget.NAME: Circular Logic Widget
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, obtain #yBird #yFaced #yUrn, #yMummfied #yHand and #yEnchiridion. Start each combat with #yMaster #yReality, #yCreative #yAI, and #yStorm.

Clerics Golden Helm.NAME: Cleric's Golden Helm
Clerics Golden Helm.FLAVOR: It's very shiny, that's how you know its important. Suggested by Galvior.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you add a card to your deck, heal #b
HP.

Dice Of Fate.NAME: Dice Of Fate
DESCRIPTIONS: You can reroll the shop's contents once per shop.

Festivus Pole.NAME: Festivus Pole
DESCRIPTIONS: You can now transform a card and upgrade it at rest sites.

Filiform Needle.NAME: Filiform Needle
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, apply 1 #yMark to all enemies. ALL enemies lose HP equal to their #yMark.

Freaky Fork.NAME: Freaky Fork
DESCRIPTIONS: Powers have a 50% chance of adding another copy into your discard pile when played.

Fresh Water.NAME: Fresh Water
Fresh Water.FLAVOR: Always Hydrate Properly. Suggested by ezLo2.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, heal #b
HP.

Green Skull.NAME: Green Skull
Green Skull.FLAVOR: Think Red Skull, but more Green like money.
DESCRIPTIONS: While your HP is at or below #b50%, you have #b3 additional Dexterity.

Happy Flower Bed.NAME: Happy Flower Bed
Happy Flower Bed.FLAVOR: They all just keep on smiling.
DESCRIPTIONS: You can now plant #yHappy #yFlowers at rest sites, counters will stagger. NL Upon pickup, obtain one #yHappy #yFlower per defeated boss.

Horn Of Plenty.NAME: Horn Of Plenty
Horn Of Plenty.FLAVOR: The rich just keep getting richer.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first rare card you play each combat is free.

Hotwired Cables.NAME: Hotwired Cables
DESCRIPTIONS: When an #yOrb is channeled, it is immediately evoked.

Jade Mystic Knot.NAME: Jade Mystic Knot
Jade Mystic Knot.FLAVOR: Round and round and round it goes.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you obtain a relic, gain #b2 Max HP.

Noxious Stone.NAME: Noxious Stone
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, gain #b2 #yEnvenom and each monster gains #b1 #yStrength.

TopMask.NAME: Top Mask
DESCRIPTIONS: The first chest you open will contain unceasing top.

PrismaticBranch.NAME: Prismatic Branch
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yExhaust a card, add a random card to your hand; no restrictions. NL Start each combat with #yCorruption and #yMaster #yof #yReality powers.

Rate Limiter.NAME: Rate Limiter
Rate Limiter.FLAVOR: Sometimes in life you just have to slow down.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start Each Combat with #b2 Focus and #b1 fewer Orb slot.

Sail.NAME: Ship's Sail
Sail.FLAVOR: Catches the wind. Suggested by bobjoejuan.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your 4th turn, gain #b
#yBlock.

Snecko Skin Boots.NAME: Snecko Skin Boots
Snecko Skin Boots.FLAVOR: Poor confusing creature, now losing its skin. suggested by coledot_.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, gain #b2 #yStrength, #b2 #yDexterity, #y-1 #yStrength, or #b-1 #yDexterity, chosen at random.

Paper Bomb.NAME: Paper Bomb
Paper Bomb.FLAVOR: It goes boom. Suggested by Galvior.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play #b
#yAttacks in a single turn, deal #b
damage to ALL enemies.

Preserved Amber.NAME: Preserved Amber
Preserved Amber.FLAVOR: Poor bug never saw it coming.
DESCRIPTIONS: Enemies in Elite rooms lose #b2 #yStrength at the start of combat.

Cheesy Fridge.NAME: Cheesy Fridge
DESCRIPTIONS: because pickled rick was taken.

Runic Replicator.NAME: Runic Replicator
Runic Replicator.FLAVOR: A lot of things are great when they're free.
DESCRIPTIONS: At start of combat, choose a card in hand. Add a copy of that card to your hand, it costs #b0 this turn.

Solid State Drive.NAME: Solid State Drive
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you evoke an orb, gain #b1 #yStrength.

Snecko Charm.NAME: Snecko Charm
DESCRIPTIONS: ? rooms can now contain Elites or Rest Sites.

Relic Compass.NAME: Relic Compass
Relic Compass.FLAVOR: All the elites are on fire? Everything is fine.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. NL All Elites gain an [additional] emerald (flaming) buff.

Rusted Lockbox.NAME: Rusted Lockbox
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon Pickup, obtain a random different character's Starter Relic.

Scales of Justice.NAME: Scales of Justice
DESCRIPTIONS: If the turn is started in #yWrath, draw #b2 cards. If the turn is ended in #yCalm, #yretain up to #b2 cards.

Supply Crate.NAME: Supply Crate
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, Obtain either Prismatic shard or A boss Relic from a different class from [Black Blood, Ring of the Serpent, Holy Water, or Frozen Core] Selected Randomly.

Tactical Harness.NAME: Tactical Harness
Tactical Harness.FLAVOR: I always wondered where she hid those knives.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a card, power, or relic would add #yShivs to the hand, create #b1 additional #yShiv.

Thief Gloves.NAME: Thief Gloves
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you attack gain 1 gold.

Tungsten Shield.NAME: Tungsten Shield
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you would block damage, if you would have block left over block 2 more.

Vampire Fang.NAME: Vampire Fang
Vampire Fang.FLAVOR: Sure they're fake teeth but the monsters won't know the difference.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #yStrike, heal #b1 HP.

Yin.NAME: Yin
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #ySkill, gain #b1 temporary #yStrength.

Venomous Scales.NAME: Venomous Scales
DESCRIPTIONS: When attacked, apply #b2 #yPoison to the attacker.

Yoga Mat.NAME: Yoga Mat
Yoga Mat.FLAVOR: Sit on it for a while to experience serenity.
DESCRIPTIONS: You can now meditate at rest sites up to 3 times, each time you meditate generates 1 mantra every turn in battle.
